midash.title: MCIT Service Desk
midash: Based on web2py/gluon/contrib/login_methods/ldap_auth.py, the
ldap_auth() function takes these parameters that may be configured
here:
-- server                 Server name, defaults to 'ldap'
-- port                   Port number, defaults to None
-- base_dn                Base DN, defaults to 'ou=users,dc=domain,dc=com'
-- mode                   Mode of operation, defaults to 'uid'. Valid values are:
ad           For Microsoft Active Directory
cn           User id attribute is 'cn'
company      Simple search with anonymous bind, then simple bind as user
domino       For Notes Domino
uid          User id attribute is 'uid'
uid_r        OpenLDAP (UID) with subtree search and multiple DNs
custom       OpenLDAP (username_attrs) with subtree search and multiple DNs
-- secure                 Use LDAPS, defaults to False. Determine port value is None, F=389, T=636
-- cert_path              TLS certificate directory, defaults to None
-- cert_file              TLS certificate file, defaults to None
-- bind_dn                Bind DN, defaults to None
-- bind_pw                Bind password, defaults to None
-- filterstr              Additional filter string, only used in some modes, defaults to 'objectClass=*'
-- username_attrib        User id attribute, defaults to 'uid'
-- custom_scope           Search Scope for 'custom' mode, defaults to 'subtree'
-- allowed_groups         A list of allowed groups (authorization), defaults to None
-- db                     Database to store user data, must have auth_user, auth_group, auth_membership, defaults to None
-- manage_user            Let web2py store user data, listed below as user_*, defaults to False
-- user_firstname_attrib  How to find user's firstname, defaults to 'cn:1'
-- user_lastname_attrib   How to find user's lastname, defaults to 'cn:2'
-- user_mail_attrib       User email address attribute, defaults to 'mail'
-- manage_groups          Let web2py manage user group data listed below as group_*, defaults to False
-- group_dn               DN for searching groups, defaults to None
-- group_name_attrib      Group name attribute, defaults to 'cn'
-- group_member_attrib    Group member attribute, defaults to 'memberUid'
-- group_filterstr        Group filter string, defaults to 'objectClass=*'
-- logging_level          Logging level, defaults to 'error'
--- MiDash ---
